tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE aid_organizations (
  org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Organizations (
  org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(50),
  org_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES Organizations(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contact (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_id INT,
  contact_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE aid_data (
  aid_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_id INT,
  aid_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE aid_project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    org_id INT REFERENCES aid_organization(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Organization (
    org_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    org_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Project (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    org_id INTEGER REFERENCES Organization(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Donation (
    donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INTEGER REFERENCES Donor(donor_id),
    project_id INTEGER REFERENCES Project(project_id),
    donation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Communication (
    comm_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    comm_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    comm_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    comm_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_id INTEGER REFERENCES Project(project_id)
);
